page.title: 10Interviewing Mr.Daniels
page.content: We interviewed {Mr. Daniels,}he was a farm_worker for{TRAFFORD ESTATES. His farm consists of 3000 acres. He lives in {FRETTENHAM.}His only dislike is there are too many foreigners in Coltishall.He likes the abundance of wildlife in the district. His views on the{R.A.F. COLTISHALL {AIRBASE}are that he has got used to it,so he doesn't mind. When the idea of an airbase was first mentioned there was quite a lot of opposition. But now, with the airbase well established the people who live in Coltishall and Horstead are quite used to it. Mr. Daniels also said that he didn't like the city and that he went there only when he had to, preferring to shop either locally (with poor choice), or in one of the larger villages or towns nearby.
